document_data.name: Totem Sister
document_data.alignment2e: {{Alignment grid| off  | on  | on | off | on | on | off  | off | off }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Totem sisters''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Angharradh]], the Union of the Three.
document_data.Culture: All totem sisters were female [[moon elves]].
document_data.Abilities:
Totem sisters possessed many of the skills and powers of common [[druid]]s.

They were able to use a rare form of [[magic]] called [[totemic magic]] that was similar to [[magic|rune magic]].
document_data.Possessions: These individuals wielded a variety of weaponry but all were skilled in the use of the [[spear]] and [[long bow]]. The types of [[armor]] they were permitted to wear were limited to [[hide armor]], [[leather armor]], [[padded armor]], [[studded leather]], or [[chainmail]]. Some totem sisters also carried a [[shield]].
